    Megatron entered the cave and resumed his throne, cold and hard as it may 
be. Currently, the majority of his troops were gone. Where could they be? He 
was agrivated enough. Taking his commlink, "Predacons, sound off. Give your 
current location and status." He demanded, a tone of anger in his deep, tact 
voice.

    Black Aracnia rumaged in the store room until she found the box cotaining 
the body parts of Tarantulas. It was actually marked, DO NOT OPEN UNDER ANY 
CIRCUMSTANCES! SIGNED TRANSANULAS. That bastard had him here the whole time...
    She dragged the bow out of the room, and was going to take it to the 
engin room. Somehow, possibly a subconscience kick in the head by Tarantulas, 
she knew she would find what she was looking for in there.
